text: Voith AG is a German multi-industry company based in Heidenheim, Baden- Württemberg. They have a global presence with offices worldwide. One of the industries served by Voith is the transportation industry. == Current products == === Transmissions === * DIWA.3E * DIWA.5 * DIWA.6 === Hybrid system === * DIWAhybrid (parallel) * ElvoDrive (serial) == Past products == === Transmissions === * DIWA * DIWA.2 * DIWA.3 == Other websites == * Category:1860s establishments in Germany Category:1864 establishments in Europe Category:Baden-Württemberg Category:Companies of Germany Category:Engineering companies
title: Voith
